rules.name: Copy_1_of_Quantity_field_contains_negative_values

fields.name: ErrorMesssage
fields.fieldText:
You have not met the criteria to create or update a service agreement.


New Agreement Requirements

Type = "New"

Sevices Agreement is Blank - there should not be one.

Opportunity Stage = Closed Won

Bill-to Account


Change Agreement Requirements

Type is not equal to New

Service Agreement is not Blank - There must be one for a change or update

Opportunity Stege = Closed Won

Bill-to Account

fields.name: NewWithServiceAgreement
fields.fieldText: You Can Not Process a New Opportunity With a Current Service Agreement. You Must Change The Order Type to Modify a Current Service Agreement, or if it is a New Opportunity, You Can Not Reference a Current Service Agreement.

fields.name: NotAuthorizedMessage
fields.fieldText:
You Are Not Authorized To Maintain Service Agreements.

See Your Administrator.

fields.name: NotClosedWon
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Must Be Closed Won to Process

fields.name: OpportunityAlreadyProcessed
fields.fieldText: This Opportunity Has Already Been Processed. You Can Not Process It Again.

screens.name: You_Must_Have_a_Bill_to_Account
screens.label: You Must Have a Bill-to Account

fields.name: BilltoMissing
fields.fieldText: You Must Have a Bill-to Account To Process an Opportunity.
